auth.bendera-putih-redirect: If you're looking for the Bendera Putih app, this is the rebranded and upgraded version for a better user experience.
auth.login-disclaimer: By logging in, you agree to our privacy policy. We only use this authentication to get your email and protect the app from unauthorised input.
